question: 1. The array 5, 4, 1, 2, 3 is sorted in ascending order. Which option provides the correctly sorted array?

answers.d: Depends on which data structure is used

question: 2. Which of the following statements is correct?

answers.b: Loge 2 is the same as Log2 e
answers.c: Log216 is the same as sqrt (16)

question: 3. Which of the following is true about Binary Trees?

answers.a: Every binary tree is either complete or full
answers.b: Every complete binary tree is also a full binary tree
answers.c: Every full binary tree is also a complete binary tree
answers.d: No binary tree is both complete and full
